hooks.command: cd $CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR && cargo fmt 2>/dev/null; git add -A && git diff --cached --quiet || git commit -m 'Auto-commit: file changes'
hooks.description: Run cargo fmt and auto-commit after file edits

hooks.command: cd $CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR && branch=$(git branch --show-current) && if [ "$branch" = "main" ]; then echo '⚠️  WARNING: You are on the main branch. If working on a GitHub issue, create a branch first: git checkout -b issue-{number}-{description}'; fi
hooks.description: Warn if on main branch when starting work
